hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)
locations.Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible C: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Path of Skulls (100/100 reachable).Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible C: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #Ruto's Letter# and #Farore's Wind#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Heart Container#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #5# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
hinted_items: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Din's Fire# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Bombchus (20 pieces)# and #Double Defense#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #the Bolero of Fire#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Game Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring# and #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #the Kokiri Sword#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #time#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Heart Container#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #7# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #9# major items.
